summary: Provides an AI‑driven interface for translating natural‑language criteria into structured CRM queries, automatically segmenting extensive geographic searches into manageable sub‑queries and executing them via an OpenAI model to retrieve matching customers, contacts, leads, or related records.
business_intent: Enable sales and marketing personnel to efficiently locate and extract relevant CRM data using conversational prompts, reducing the need for manual query construction and improving data‑driven decision making.
